## 1.Clean data


### 1.1 
```{r clean data}

makelele <- read_csv("data/raw/Makelele et al. 2021/Yoko_chronosequence_transect.csv") %>%
  rename(Plot_code = plots, Name = species)


makelele_trait <- makelele %>%
  select(Name, SLA, LDMC, C, N, P, WD) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  group_by(Name) %>%
  summarise(across(where(is.numeric), ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE))) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  select(order(colnames(.))) %>%
  relocate(Name) %>%
  arrange(Name)

#makelele_veg <- makelele %>%
 # select(Plot_code, Name) %>%
  #group_by(Plot_code) %>%
  #count(Name) %>%
  #pivot_wider(names_from = Name, values_from = n) %>%
  #replace(is.na(.), 0) %>%
  #column_to_rownames(var = "Plot_code") %>%
  #select(order(colnames(.)))

makelele_veg <- makelele %>%
  select(Plot_code, Name, BA) %>%
  group_by(Plot_code, Name) %>%
  summarise(across(where(is.numeric), ~sum(., na.rm = T))) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = Name, values_from = BA) %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0) %>%
  column_to_rownames(var = "Plot_code") %>%
  select(order(colnames(.)))

makelele_trait_fd <- makelele_trait %>%
  column_to_rownames(var = "Name") 

species_list_fd <- makelele_trait %>% pull(Name)

makelele_veg_fd <- makelele_veg %>%
  select(all_of(species_list_fd))

makelele_species_list <- colnames(makelele_veg_fd)

makelele_trait <- makelele_trait %>%
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ c(scale(., center = F)))) 

traitlist <- sort(c( "SLA", "LDMC", "C", "N", "P", "WD"))
cwm_names <- paste0(traitlist, "_cwm")
cwv_names <- paste0(traitlist, "_cwv")

trait_information <- lst(traitlist, cwm_names, cwv_names)

``` 


## 5. Perform calculations
```{r calculations }

makelele_processed_specieslvl <- cats_preparation(input_veg = makelele_veg, 
                                              input_trait = makelele_trait, cutoff_value =  0.8, 
                                              trait_information = trait_information,
                                              trait_detail = "Study")

mean_dist <- calculate_mean_dist(makelele_veg, makelele_processed_specieslvl)

FD <- dbFD(makelele_trait_fd, makelele_veg_fd, stand.x = T)

FD_df <- data.frame(FEve = FD$FEve,
        FDiv  = FD$FDiv,
        FRic = FD$FRic,
        RaoQ = FD$RaoQ,
        qual.FRic = FD$qual.FRic) %>%
  rownames_to_column(var = "Plot_code")

diversity_info <- makelele_processed_specieslvl[["relative_abundances"]][["matrix4traits_prop"]] %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  mutate(shannon = diversity(.[,1:ncol(.)], index = "shannon", MARGIN = 1, base = exp(1)),
         simpson = diversity(.[,1:ncol(.)], index = "simpson", MARGIN = 1, base =exp(1)),
         species_richness = specnumber(.[,1:ncol(.)], MARGIN = 1),
         empty_states = ncol(makelele_processed_specieslvl[["relative_abundances"]][["matrix4traits_prop"]]) - species_richness,
         meta_size = ncol(makelele_processed_specieslvl[["relative_abundances"]][["matrix4traits_prop"]])) %>%
  select(shannon, simpson, species_richness, empty_states, meta_size) %>% # base = exp(1) gives the shannon index a log e base
  rownames_to_column(var = "Plot_code") %>% 
  full_join(mean_dist) %>%
  full_join(FD_df)




```



## 6. Cats model
```{r cats calculations}

#Determines amount of cores, substract four to keep to pc free for other processes.
n_cores <- parallel::detectCores() - 5 

my_cluster <- makeSOCKcluster(n_cores)

registerDoSNOW(cl = my_cluster)

foreach::getDoParRegistered() # check if cluster is set up


makelele_cats <- cats_calculations(makelele_processed_specieslvl, trait_information,
                               trait_detail = "Study") %>%
  mutate(study = "Makelele")

makelele_figure <- cats_visualisation(makelele_cats) %>%
  mutate(study = "Makelele")

save(makelele_processed_specieslvl, makelele_figure, makelele_species_list, makelele_cats,
 file = "data/processed/makelele_calculations.RData")

ggplot(makelele_figure, aes(x = species_richness, y = KLR2)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~Deviance) + 
  theme_classic() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  labs(title = "The relationship between species richness and the CATS decomposition - Makelele et al. 2021",
       x = "Species richness") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = 2) +
   coord_cartesian(ylim = c(-0.2, 1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(-0.2, 0,0.2, 0.4, 
    0.6,  0.8,  1
  )) 

ggplot(makelele_figure, aes(x = mean_dist, y = KLR2)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~Deviance) + 
  theme_classic() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  labs(title = "The relationship between plot dissimilarity and the CATS decomposition - Makelele et al. 2021",
       x = "Average Bray-Curtis index value") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = 2) +
   coord_cartesian(ylim = c(-0.2, 1)) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(-0.2, 0,0.2, 0.4, 
    0.6,  0.8,  1
  )) 






```
